name: Viatris Inc.
description: Viatris Inc. is a global healthcare company formed through the merger of Mylan and Upjohn, a division of Pfizer, in 2020. The company aims to empower people worldwide to live healthier at every stage of life. Viatris operates in more than 165 countries and territories and offers a diverse portfolio of over 1,400 medicines across various therapeutic areas, including infectious diseases, oncology, cardiovascular, and respiratory conditions. The company's mission is to provide access to high-quality medicines, ensuring that patients have the medications they need, when they need them. Viatris is committed to sustainability and social responsibility, focusing on improving health outcomes and promoting global health equity. The company also invests heavily in research and development to innovate and expand its product offerings, harnessing the strengths of both legacy companies to address unmet medical needs. Viatris is dedicated to fostering partnerships and collaborations with healthcare providers and organizations to enhance healthcare delivery and access. With a strong emphasis on quality, affordability, and patient-centric solutions, Viatris continues to make significant strides in the pharmaceutical industry, striving to create a healthier world.

seo.meta_description: Explore Viatris Inc., a global healthcare company dedicated to providing access to high-quality medicines and empowering healthier lives.

faq.question: What does Viatris do?
faq.answer: Viatris provides access to high-quality medicines and aims to empower people to live healthier lives.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Viatris?
faq.answer: Michael Goettler is the CEO of Viatris Inc.

faq.question: Where is Viatris headquartered?
faq.answer: Viatris is headquartered in Canonsburg, Pennsylvania, USA.

faq.question: When was Viatris founded?
faq.answer: Viatris was founded in 2020 through the merger of Mylan and Upjohn.
